lenders.name: Jacqui
lenders.loan_because: Because I can't change the world, but I can make a big difference in  someone less fortunate's life by helping them to help themselves.

lenders.name: Perla
lenders.loan_because:
I want to help make a diference in someone's life.   I once was a struggling entrepreneur myself and know about how tough it can be.   
These people do it a lot harder than I ever did

Quiero ayudar a diferenciar en la vidas de jente. Era una vez empresario luchador mismo y sé sobre cómo es resistente puede ser. Esta gente lo hace mucho más difícilmente que lo hice antes.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: that´s a small step for a man ...
lenders.occupational_info: teach children

lenders.name: Gaby & Friedrich
lenders.loan_because: we can. This is a very good possibility for the assistence for self-helping of other, poorer people in the whole world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are married since 1976 and have two children, Kersten and Leona. We live in a small village in the "Hunsrück", a low moutain range in Germany.

lenders.name: Maree
lenders.loan_because: I have been lucky in my travels to see first hand how proud and friendly people with very little are and how hard they strive to improve their lives and their families lives.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: i want to give back something

lenders.name: Magda
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people and I know when I will be need help yhey hepl me too .

lenders.name: Gitta
lenders.loan_because: I like this idea to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I´m working for ABB an I make technical drawings which shows how to build the electrical things of  powers stations all over the world

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Aidan & Dilyn
lenders.loan_because: Every week, we set aside part of our allowances to "share" with others.  We may only be 12 and 8 years old, but we like to see how we can help other people achieve their dreams.

lenders.name: Jérôme
lenders.loan_because: I admire the spirit of enterprise these people have and hope that their standard of living will increase through the investments that are made possible by the loan.

lenders.name: Ralph and Jenny
lenders.loan_because: Our lives have been blessed.  We want to give someone the opportunity to expand their lives, too, through the development of a successful business.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: Its great to be able to give back to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: Hectic but rewarding.

lenders.name: Maret
lenders.loan_because: I believe money should be used. To do things.

lenders.name: lisanne
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone should deserve the right to make a go of things in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: My twin sister and I are dog groomers and we work for ourselves from home. :):) We love animals and what we do!

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I'm grateful that I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an Australian charity called The Smith Family.  Our focus is on education which is the key to breaking the cycle of disadvantage in Australia as much as it's the key to breaking it overseas.

lenders.name: Tracey
lenders.loan_because: It gives me immense gratification to know that i'am able to make a real difference in somebody's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a University student currently studying in the area of health sciences.

lenders.name: Nacho
lenders.loan_because: The end of poverty is not only a dream

lenders.name: SiteStories: web media
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the value and power of micro-finance.
lenders.occupational_info: SiteStories creates audio and video programming for the web.  We create media for clients, and also develop original shows for syndication across the web.

lenders.name: Katrina
lenders.loan_because: so little to us(the equivalent of a meal out) means a phenomenal change to the lives of others
lenders.occupational_info: supporting and educating mothers to breastfeed their children

lenders.name: Catherine & Jack
lenders.loan_because: We hope our loans will make a real difference to someone's life. Love telling people about this! It's addictive..
lenders.occupational_info: We own two businesses , but the main one is to help operating businesses keep their records to show if they are operating a profit and are therefore succesful.

lenders.name: Joachin Family
lenders.loan_because: We want others to have the chance to make life better for themselves and their families.  Small actions can make a difference and help build a world that works for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: Danilo is a Procurement Consultant purchasing IT equipment and services for government.  Tammy manages Organisational Development in a state government agency.

lenders.name: ROSEMARY
lenders.loan_because: i wanted to upgrage my business and because of my clients that are demanding for better service each day without me providing them  because of funds
lenders.occupational_info: well i do try my best to meet up except that i dont have much funds

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I like to help those who help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist construction team in doing their work.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: It is every man's obligation to put back into the world at least the equivalent of what he takes out of it.

lenders.name: David & Jodi
lenders.loan_because: our family has a full and rich life. We say...Pay it forward.

lenders.name: Bobbie
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Philippe
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate to have the support of my friends and family.  I believe that I can help other people develop new skills through lending.  As their business improves, so will their quality of life and the lives of people around them.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working on a master's degree in software engineering.

lenders.name: Kari
lenders.loan_because: it's a small way to make a difference.  I got started with Kiva by a gift given to me by a professor on my graduation.  Now I love to give Kiva credit as gifts as well!

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I can help make difference in the life of a few people

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because:
Is the rich world aware of how four  billion of the six billion live? If we were aware, we would want to help out, we'd want to get involved.
"Bill Gates"

Charity is a supreme virtue, and the great channel through which the mercy of God is passed on to mankind. It is the virtue that unites men and inspires their noblest efforts.
"Conrad Hilton"

lenders.name: Matt and Melissa
lenders.loan_because: We realize that we are very fortunate people and think that others should have as many opportunities as we do.
lenders.occupational_info: Matt works at a bank and Melissa works for an organization that is fighting to stop global warming.

lenders.name: Caspar
lenders.loan_because: In 2003, I had setup my own business, which I later sold after running it for eight years. Through micro-finance loans, I wish more people, particularly from developing economies, to share in the experience of building something on your own and developing it into something that can benefit your community around you.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Sales for an international Internet company, where we help to bring merchants together with their users and customers.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is not "right" to give money for nothing.  I do not want to see cycles of  dependency, but rather, cycles of responsibility, and confidence.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with organizations to build their capacities to not just grow, but to develop.  I work across sectors and take a strong stance on social responsibility.

lenders.name: Jackie
lenders.loan_because: There is joy in giving.
lenders.occupational_info: Consultant

lenders.name: Tarin
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.

lenders.name: Buck
lenders.loan_because: I love others and want to give to them. Luke 6:38, "Give and it shall be given unto you, good measure, pressed down, shaken together, and running over  shall men give unto your bosom.For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again."
lenders.occupational_info: I write magazine articles and books.

lenders.name: Elisabet
lenders.loan_because: it's needed and a great investment.

lenders.name: Manuel & Angelika
lenders.loan_because: We're fortunate to be able to.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I can, and I should.
lenders.occupational_info: I study Education in Minnesota.

lenders.name: cathleen
lenders.loan_because: I have faced some personal difficulties raising 4 children on my own so I have empathy for  others less fortunate
lenders.occupational_info: I worked in Radio & TV for 25 years writing, producing and directing commercials.  I now do a little desktop publishing from home

lenders.name: Jeanette

lenders.occupational_info: I help people understand and learn about the medications they are taking.

lenders.name: zander
lenders.loan_because: It's a good cause that helps keep me down to earth.

lenders.name: Ragagli Family
lenders.loan_because: My kids and I loan because what is a small scarifice for us can be a significant impact for another person.  My kids are learning about giving as well as making a "virtual" connection with another part of the world.

lenders.name: Jesse

lenders.occupational_info: I shelve books at the local library.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a good way to support entrepreneurship in the developing countries.

lenders.name: Aubrey Karen Acy Kaylan
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my opportunities and teach my girls the same.  We raise peppers in our garden and then dry, crush and bottle the blend for friends.  So many people tried to pay us for it, that we decided to donate proceeds directly to Kiva to help a fellow farmer!
lenders.occupational_info: We run a brewpub, manage 2 family rental houses, a garden and raise our 2 girls on the Outer Banks of North Carolina.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the film and television industry.

lenders.name: Kristy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the world become a better place.

lenders.name: Sallye
lenders.loan_because: I just read the Book Three Cups of Tea and am so moved by the work that Greg Mortensen has and is doing.  I also think that one person really can make a difference in the world.  This is one step for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a labor and delivery nurse.

lenders.name: Lorane
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I speak to the public about how to access their inner strength and to connect with spirit.

lenders.name: Maggy
lenders.loan_because: it makes so much sense.

lenders.name: Bhargav
lenders.loan_because: it's so easy it'd be a crime not to!

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.occupation: Student--Training for a MD and a JD
lenders.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurialism is a powerful force for creating meaningful and sustainable change.  Making capital both affordable and accessible to those with the drive and ideas to drive such change is key to the development of foreign economies and to the betterment of individuals' lives.  Donor aid has its place, but business drives economies and buoys lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a doctor.  Studying the law is a bit of a detour.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I've always loved the entrepreneurial spirit!

lenders.name: Geoff
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to be generous.
lenders.occupational_info: I market and sell renewable energy to households.

lenders.occupational_info: Caring for and teaching children is very rewarding and is a joy.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I would like to support hope and happiness. I would like to share my freedom with those who don't find freedom in their own current situation.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an international hotel company in the field of human resources.

lenders.name: Elliot
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place and to help the people of the world.

lenders.name: Philipp
lenders.loan_because: I like to help.

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: I can!!! I have been blessed with so many opportunities in my life, so now I can bless the lives of others in return.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach nursery aged children (3-4 year olds) at the American School in Japan

lenders.name: Olivero
lenders.loan_because: You can't use an old map to find new land.
lenders.occupational_info:
Whatever, a Belgium-based “intrapreneurial” company, provides a full range of tightly integrated services to information-hungry clients: workshops on searching the Web and building collective knowledge, consultancy on the safe and effective use of IT in the information era, and tools such as Knowledge Plaza, a Web-based platform that assists knowledge professionals in searching, managing, and sharing information.

123Generiques is a multi-faceted biopharmaceutical project in West Africa regrouping cultures of Artemisia annua plants (in collaboration with the UCL laboratory of pharmacognosy), a drug distribution platform and the set up of a generic pharmaceutical company.

http://www.linkedin.com/in/olivierverbeke

lenders.name: Cortney
lenders.loan_because: I love paying it forward!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a chef who runs a very busy catering company and trains student chefs.

lenders.occupational_info: I do all the invoicing for a freight forwarding company.

lenders.name: P. Athena & Jarod Nozawa

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a medical coder for a hospital.

lenders.occupational_info: IT Specialist in Banking industry. Owner ISP company.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a casual nurse and also a property investor on the Gold Coast of Queensland, Australia.

lenders.name: jessica

lenders.name: Tristan

lenders.occupational_info: I work as an electrician installing commercial equipment in laundries.  I work for a large American company.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: As a Christian I feel it is important to help those who may have less material assets than me and this is a great way to help others around the world.

lenders.name: Ellie
lenders.loan_because: She needed help and it is kind to help other people. It also feels good.

lenders.name: Leigh & Dan
lenders.loan_because: We wish to give to those who demonstrate the drive and ambition to improve the quality of their own lives, as well as their community. We give this money in the name of Jesus Christ, who has given us the greatest gift.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: So the mechanic can fix more cars. I like cars, too.  I hope he makes a NASCAR.

lenders.name: Dina
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed in the US. I feel that to much is given much is expected and I want to share and bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am fortunate enough to be able to stay home and raise 3 wonderful children.  I also homeschool my children which means I am their teacher and we do school  at home.

lenders.name: Naoo
lenders.loan_because: my daughter already a member of Kiva.

lenders.name: Paonia Colorado
lenders.loan_because: Energy must flow

lenders.name: Sitaram
lenders.loan_because: Success has nothing to do with what you gain in life or accomplish for yourself. It's what you do for others (famous quote from Danny Thomas).

lenders.name: Trysteen
lenders.loan_because: I am a citizen of this world who sees an urgency in the need to reach out and help others. There is no greater reward above that which lies in the simple act of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the profession of raising awareness about all facets of life and living in every crevice of this shared world.

lenders.name: Nishi
lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Bank which is really not that exciting.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: People with ambition and creativity deserve a chance. I love to see what people can achieve when they're motivated to improve things.
lenders.occupational_info: I make documentaries for television. I have also been an actor for many years in theater and independent film.

lenders.name: Rick & Sue
lenders.loan_because: we recognize how very lucky we are  and this is the best way we've found to make a small contribution that could have a big impact.
lenders.occupational_info: We are learning to invest in real estate and trade equities (stocks) and foreign exchange.  If we are good students, we'll become wealthy.  Then our families will be well provided for, and we can begin to make bigger contributions.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to start an independent life

lenders.name: Lila
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student in school.

lenders.loan_because:
i would like the world to be a better place,
the Lord has given us so much
if we can just give a little back to his children
it makes me feel very happy
lenders.occupational_info:
i am a manager of a sales organization
dealing in diffrent products

lenders.name: Stig
lenders.loan_because: Enable people without normal banking  capability to start their own business and provide for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an entrepeneur with my own company, where we do investments and various projects within the energy sector.

lenders.name: McDermott Family
lenders.loan_because: If everyone did the same we would greatly reduce poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of our children and the household.

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is such a brilliant idea, I felt like I had to get involved.

lenders.name: helen
lenders.loan_because: The good Lord has bountifully blessed me and my family. I applaud people who are prepared to 'have-a-go' and better themselves & opportunities for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach mainly 4 year olds at a Kindergarten. I believe in empowering children to 'have-a-go', persist & master new skills thereby enabling them to gain positive dispositions to become lifelong learners - able to successfully live in a world that we cant even imagine.

lenders.name: Albert and Tarien
lenders.loan_because: We want to give something back to those who are less fortunate and we think this is an fantastic idea to help people and families to help themselves, to support them in a way which lift them up that and improves their families lives!

lenders.name: vicki
lenders.loan_because: I was once a single mum struggling to get by and now i am able to give something back and hopefully my small donation can help someone else achieve their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children ages ranging from 6mths old to school age, very enjoyable..

lenders.name: Ralph
lenders.loan_because: we are all connected to eachother; I have arrived at a certain understanding that there is no you. there is only we.
lenders.occupational_info: transformation of consciousness

lenders.name: Seamus
lenders.loan_because: I can ... and so I should.

lenders.name: Gregory
lenders.loan_because: I have met some wonderful people from many different cultures and would like to support people prepared to have a go.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for the financial management of  local government on the beautiful island of Tasmania.

lenders.name: Susanne
lenders.loan_because: I like to share what I have
lenders.occupational_info: i try to attend and help people in difficult circumstances.

lenders.name: Glenno
lenders.loan_because: I live by the saying "More to all and less to none"

lenders.name: Sibelle
lenders.loan_because:
I was and am in the same boat- No money, starting my life all over again, a good idea for a small business but absolutely zero support (and this in the so called first world)- Even the business founder bank and my own bank who know my clean record over the last 25 years said: 'The sum you need is too small'. Well dammit, i did it anyway, selling personal affairs and with some people who trusted in me and gave me goods on credit (their trust was rewarded and everything paid within the month) and a hell of a lot of work day and night i got it up and running- And I know it's the same for all those people all over the world. The work needed and courage to continue, how important it is for not just your own future but a nations overall economic welfare that people can go and do something, start businesses from scratch - It's the thousands of little busily whizzing wheels of these entepreneurs that make a country GO with a capital G.
What better way to use even the small amounts of profit I am making now, than reinvest them in these humans all over the globe!
 I wish them the best of luck and.. do what i can, practically , to help make it happen. Hope you will jump on the train and invest a little income in people, not stock shares- this is the global stock of the future. Thanks xx
lenders.occupational_info: Ouff, multi tasking is the word! I design logos and websites,  write and translate texts, but also breed, buy and trade exotic winterhardy plants (Palm trees and bamboo for exmaple) With the money generated, i try to keep on working as an atist (I also write , do photography and paint) and reinvest some in projects which encourage native plants and nature ( my organisation is a member of greenpeace & Öomraan feriaan (Nature Protction and educative excursions for a Wadden Sea island) and donates every month, to name just one) well, and kiva of course!

lenders.name: KAORU
lenders.loan_because: I'm a lucky and like to make an effort to correspond to it.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a small business and one cannot survive without the support of community, be it local or global. I am blessed to have the support of family and community. As a responsible global citizen, I am proud to give back to the community and thrilled to have this opportunity to help a visionary realize their goal of starting or expanding their small business.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Virtual Assistant. I provide secretarial services to small businesses who either cannot afford to hire a full-time assistant, or have the space and equipment available. It is a very cost-effective option as the small business only pays for services rendered.  May I say it is an eco-friendly career. I think I fill up the tank in my car about once a month instead of twice weekly when I worked for a big company!

lenders.name: Fred & Jametta
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help people while letting them be independent.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: its the right thing to do. We are called to help one another

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate for my birthday and I think this way of helping developing countries makes alot of sense.
lenders.occupational_info: I put together a community newspaper which shares community stories with the community.  I also help a wind ensemble manage their concerts and rehearsals.

lenders.name: In Memoriam
lenders.loan_because:
In Memory of members of my immediate family who have passed away : 

Father [November 2, 1900, Curacao, NA to November 1, 1972, Montreal, Quebec], 

Mother [Sept 22,1906 ~ Nijmegen, The Netherlands to July 14, 2008 ~ Quebec, Canada] and 

Eldest brother [October 5,1932, Curacao, NA -September 24, 2008, Montreal, Quebec] .

May they rest in peace.

Borrowers in these Developing Nations are above all human beings who need others to believe in them, to help them to believe in themselves and to assist them, from time to time, along their journey. 

"The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall." - Nelson Mandela

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: It is a good stimulation for (starting) businesses and it helps out people who otherwise could not get a loan.
lenders.occupational_info:
I used to work in the graphic industry, together with a team we made weekly newspapers.
A few of the things I did where: creating/changing advertisements and helping on the layout of pages (the way a page looks).

In my spare time I like to read, browse the internet, listen to music and work on websites.

lenders.name: Arnt Jostein
lenders.loan_because: This seems like a very good way to help other people

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected and all riding this amazing planet together. Sharing is essential for our world family to thrive.

lenders.name: Martina
lenders.loan_because: it takes so little to make a difference

lenders.name: Kemp Family of Larkspur
lenders.loan_because:
Give someone a fish and you feed him/her for a day; teach a someone to fish and you feed him/her for a lifetime.

. Knowledge is the best charity
. to learn a lesson is a far better reward than to win a prize early in the GAME
. it is better to know how to help yourself than to beg from others

lenders.name: Laszlo
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Joy
lenders.loan_because: the word says that we will be lenders to nations and not borrowers. The thought of helping someone makes life meaningful.
lenders.occupational_info: I do route accounting and workman's compensation for our office in Charlotte, NC. I work in the textile industry.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: it makes so much sense.

lenders.name: Imaginations Ink
lenders.loan_because: "We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give." - Winston Churchill
lenders.occupational_info:
The focus of our work thus far has been two fold. Our first and main objective is to promote cultural transmission through film in hopes of fostering a better understanding of human life  and it's many complexities. 
Secondly, as we believe that we as humans will always be inseparably connected to the Earth, our goal is to illustrate environmental issues worldwide and the human toll that accompanies them.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: This is the most incredible way to give thanks for the blessings and abundance that fills my life. I am so happy to help my sisters around the world rise up and live abundantly.

lenders.name: Yung Joo
lenders.loan_because: We share this small planet.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I've been an entrepreneur for 30 years and want to help support others in developing nations.
lenders.occupational_info: We Develop Innovative Technology Solutions for the World Trade Community.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: Be the change you wish to see in the world. ~ Gandhi

lenders.name: Deni
lenders.loan_because: Mohammad Yunus, Grameen Bank, is one of my favorite leaders in this world.  He proved that microfinance works to help people lift themselves out of poverty.  I am happy to have the opportunity to be a part of that process in someones life.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I am working temporary jobs as an administrative assistant to support myself as I attend college.  The positions I work require basic secretarial and accounting skills.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I enjoying helping people who are striving to live a productive life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with middle school students to help them learn how to solve problems they may be experiencing.

lenders.name: Ellen & Alan
lenders.loan_because: We were given a Kiva credit as a wedding gift. What a wonderful present! We are thrilled that our happiness has become a way to help others around the world.

lenders.name: Matt & Jane
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I sit at a computer, writing software most of the day.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women establish themselves in business so they are able to support their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell broadcast air time--radio commercials.

lenders.name: Sana
lenders.loan_because: I want to grow up in a world where people will have the same opportunities I do.

lenders.name: Lannie
lenders.loan_because: because something so simple can do so much.

lenders.name: Eagle Wings Church
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Our statement of purpose is to grow together in Christ through worship, fellowship and service.

lenders.name: Chad Anderson
lenders.loan_because: Through my travels to southern India (Tsunami Zone), Mexico, DR, and North Africa, I have come to realize how much our fellow human beings in developing countries need encouragement, hope, support, and to understand how much they truly matter.  I strongly believe that if we all do our small part to help others in need, together we can make this world a better place!
lenders.occupational_info: Pricing Analyst & Project Manager - At Better World Books, we are committed to helping provide better lives and a chance for economic, social and political freedom through literacy. We believe that good education can break the cycle of poverty. And that's why we partner with these passionate non-profit partners to make some change for the better.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: "Freely you have received, freely give" (Matthew 10:8)

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.occupation: Program Director in an after-school care program

lenders.name: Pedro
lenders.loan_because: I believe that a small aid can make a huge change in somebody's life

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.whereabouts: Tweed Heads South New South Wales

lenders.name: Cassie
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people less fortunate than myself a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to become a high school teacher.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: We loan to try and make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I  take care of my family. I have 5 children

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I believe the best way to make a difference is to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Chuck & Lana
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others

lenders.name: HKM
lenders.loan_because: I want people everywhere to take part in the improvement of their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help Canadian corporations in their corporate social responsibility (environmental and social) programs.

lenders.name: Laurel
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Hayley
lenders.loan_because: I live in a very fortunate country and believe that by helping others i can in a small way make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to improve their quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a freelance English to Spanish translator with a penchant for medical subjects.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: I was alerted to Kiva via my daughter and thought it was a great way to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I run the day to day operation of a law firm.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I feel lucky to be able to help.  And, it's so easy!

lenders.name: Ken and Kathy
lenders.loan_because: We are all one on this beautiful planet and we are grateful that we can help our neighbors!

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: A small amount of help can make a big difference in someone's life. If we are in a position to give even that small bit of help, we should. Together our efforts  can change the world - KIVA is the proof.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I live in a country where I have had wonderful opportunities given to me by wonderful people.  I want to do the same for others!
lenders.occupational_info: I assist those who are in danger of losing their homes.  It is my job to try and help them keep them.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: it's needed.

lenders.name: Abel
lenders.loan_because: I am very blessed and I realize that $25 is really nothing to me. But to someone who wants to and is willing to work hard, it is an opportunity to succeed and better themselves.

lenders.name: Gemma
lenders.loan_because: I feel I am so privileged in my life that I should try and help others as much as possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student working hard to get my journalism degree

lenders.name: Ekkehard
lenders.loan_because: I believe this to be a powerful tool to help people in need. And - let's be honest - a few dollars are not a big sacrifice. Yet they can help make somebody's dreams come true in other regions of the planet we share.
lenders.occupational_info: Married, two sons. Managing Director of an advertising agency in Munich, Germany. We provide business-to-business communication, i.e. Corporate Identities, web marketing, direct mailings, consutling and training of communication issues.

lenders.name: Vikram M.
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the ventures of all the entrepreneurs here and their drive towards self-sustainability.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: It only takes a small loan and a great community to make a world of difference to someone.  This is a wonderful idea and I intend to contribute what I can to help others.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: I'd love to be able to say that I'm doing thing simply because I think it's a great way to help people build a better life for themselves and their families, and that really is a very big part of it.  But it's also because after having been homebound and disabled for about a decade, I don't often get to feel like I'm actually doing anything to try and change things for the better - like I don't have a purpose in being here. I know it's kind of selfish to be motivated to do something because it makes *you* feel better, but I have to admit that, for me, that's part of it.

lenders.loan_because: As a small businessman, I lke to support other small businesses.

lenders.name: DAVORKA
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people  in their effort  to make a better living

lenders.name: paperchai
lenders.loan_because: Paperchai is a small creative enterprise and shares links with entrepreneurs around the world. As we grow, so should they, and vice versa. The world is a small place and we are all linked together by who we are and what we do.

lenders.loan_because: Only through example can we truly expect to promote lasting change

lenders.loan_because: I am able. So I must.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.occupation: Computer Systems Administration - Focus: File Serv
lenders.loan_because: My friends are getting married and this is what they want as their wedding present.  Best and funnest wedding gift I have EVER shopped for.
lenders.occupational_info: My focus is enterprise file server support.  Instead of storing files on thousands of machines  around the company they are stored on consolidated machines that do nothing but serve data.  The data might look like it is on the machine on someone's desk but it is actually on a large system with hundreds of disk drives.

lenders.name: Mantua Cares
lenders.occupational_info: Mantua Cares serves as a local resource for self- developmental education and a community exchange of information. lenders.name: Lydia
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach mathematics.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves if they are able.  I choose to help Mexico because they are our neighbors and our economies are inter-related.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a social worker/counselor in a mental health program for senior adults.  I love helping people.

lenders.name: Endha
lenders.loan_because: Free Classifieds

lenders.name: Satchit
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I create websites and programs to manage and present business data.

lenders.name: Steve & Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I started my successful business with a personal loan from an investor.

lenders.name: Jo-Anne and Sander
lenders.loan_because: We want to help others make good lives for themselves and their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I import and sell Dutch flower bulbs and vegetable, herb and flower seeds across the U.S. through catalogs.

lenders.name: Tess
lenders.loan_because: To give people a chance to improve their lives, and the lives of those around them.
lenders.occupational_info: I make fun computer programs.

lenders.name: Naomi, Ryan, Adam
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I read the The Bottom Billion: Why the Poorest Countries are Failing and What Can Be Done About It and want to be part of the solution.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy telling stories orally, visually and textually.

lenders.name: StoneBoy
lenders.loan_because: I went visit Cambodia and witness how economically disadvantaged people are and hopefully I could help out a bit.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a very steady and professional day job that I enjoy but I would like to channel my energy to help others in my spare time.

lenders.name: Lander
lenders.loan_because: I believe microfinance is a powerful tool to provide opportunities to motivated people. And I get to learn about interesting individuals in the process.

lenders.name: Renee
lenders.loan_because: I feel helping people is the most important thing we can do today!!!

lenders.name: Kendall
lenders.loan_because: I have the capacity to help the people on Kiva in a very real way.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to 14-18 year olds. I teach some classes of native speakers, and some classes of second language learners, who come from all over the world hoping for a better life.

lenders.name: Polina
lenders.loan_because: I'm a first generation immigrant myself, whose family went through ups and downs of transition from the Soviet Union communism to somewhat capitalism of independent Ukraine - hyperinflation, lost savings, security and jobs. I do relate to the borrowers and want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: It's abstract . Project management in brand consultancy and design firm.
